title: viparItam idu
sahitya:
(rAgA:  shrI)   
  viparItam idu vENDAm vAzhvai vINAkkAdE manamE


anupallavi

  apacAra nindaiyum ahambhAva cintaiyum AkAshak-kOTTaiyil adhikAra vindaiyum


caraNam 1    pEship-pEshi pozhudaip-perum kolai sheivadEn pErAshaip-pittattAl UrArai vaivadEn
Ashai AnavangaLAl mOsamAi naDappadEn arivaip-poippulan vazhi alaindiDa viDuppadEn
    caraNam 2  				(rAgA:  maNirangu)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 G2 R2 S  paNam tEDi udavAmal padukki nI vaippadEn pApa puNNiyangaLaip-pArAdu naDappadEn
guNam tanaip-pOTrAdu kuTramE kANbadEn kuppait-toTTiyil vAzhvaik-koTTi vINAvadEn
    caraNam 3  				(rAgA:  madhyamAvati)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 R2 S  nItiyaik-kai viTTu jAtiyai madippadEn nenjil uNarcciyinri NilikkaNNghuppadEn
bOdha guru mIdum poippazhi punaivadEn pOlit-tOlazhagaiyE pozhudellAm ninaivadEn
    caraNam 4  				(rAgA:  AbhEri)Aa:S G2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G2 R2 S  aDuttavar vAzhkkaiyaik-keDuttiDap-pAivadEn AkAsha kuNDanAi arivinri mAivadEn
eDuttadarkkellAm nAi pOl erindu vizhuvadEn EmATru mAyattai kAmuTrut-tozhuvadEn
    caraNam 5  				(rAgA:  mukhAri)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 D2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R2 S  mOhak-kuzhiyil kaNNai mUDip-pOi vizhuvadEn mutti neri shonnAl mUkkAlE azhuvadEn
dAham pasi enrAl tAzhppAL irukkuvadEn dambaDik-kAsirkkum saNDai murukkuvadEn
    caraNam 6  				(rAgA:  bhairavi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R2 S  bhOga sukhamellAm puLipput-taTTip-pOghum pudaitta paNattaik-kAla bhUtam koNDE pOghum
dEham vizhu munnE mOhamaDangi uLLE dEhiyaik-kANAdu teruvil alaivadEn
